renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define F float(iFrame)
#define rgb(U) texture(iChannel0,(U)/R)
#define drgb(U) texture(iChannel1,(U)/R)
#define mpn(U) texture(iChannel2,(U)/R)
#define dmpn(U) texture(iChannel3,(U)/R)
// portion of screen used:
#define W .4
#define kill if (U.x>R.x*W-1.||U.y>R.y*W-1.||U.x<1.||U.y<1.) discard;
#define mouse (iMouse*W)
//controls :
#define dt .75
#define k 1.

#define q 0.0005
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
